casebody.data:
Paula FISHER, Widow of Harrison Fisher, Jr., Deceased Employee, Plaintiff,
v.
UNITED CONTINENTAL HOLDINGS, INC. d/b/a United Airlines, Employer, Insurance Company of the State of Pennsylvania, Carrier (Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Administrator), Defendants. No. COA16-1210 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 19, 2017

AFFIRMED.
